changeSet.author: anazar
changeSet.sql:
create table charm ( id serial not null, name varchar(255), description varchar(255), energy real, actually boolean, primary key(id)
)

changeSet.author: anazar
changeSet.sql: create table client ( id serial not null, firstname varchar(50) not null, lastname varchar(255) not null, patronymic varchar(255), gender varchar(255), birth_date date, charm int, primary key(id), foreign key(charm) references charm(id) )

changeSet.author: anazar
changeSet.sql: create table client_addr ( client int not null, type varchar(255) not null, street varchar(255), house varchar(255), flat varchar(255), primary key(client, type), foreign key(client) references client(id) )

changeSet.author: anazar
changeSet.sql: create table client_phone ( client int not null, number varchar(255) not null, type varchar(255), primary key(number), foreign key(client) references client(id) )

changeSet.author: anazar
changeSet.sql: create table client_account ( id serial not null primary key, client int, money real, number varchar(255), registered_at timestamp, foreign key(client) references client(id) )

changeSet.author: anazar
changeSet.sql: create table transaction_type ( id serial not null, code varchar(255), name varchar(255), primary key(id) )

changeSet.author: anazar
changeSet.sql:
create table client_account_transaction ( id serial not null, account int, money real, finished_at timestamp, type int, primary key(id), foreign key(account) references client_account(id), foreign key(type) references transaction_type(id)
)
